body.p: To his Exl B Magoffin Governor of Kentucky your petitioners would most respectfully state that at the last March term of the Rockcastle circuit court Jacob Scarborough who is now confined in the penitentiary was convicted of manslaughter for killing one Robt Aulder and sentenced to the penetentiary for the term of two years, and has been there now about Six months. We would most respectfully state that he was taken away from a very large helpless and destitute family. He is an old inoffensive man and we cincerly hope that your Exellency will pardon him for the ballance of the time
